page.title: 08MUSIC
page.content:
Here are the top 10 selling records for the week ending 5th July 1985.
1 Frankie by Sister Sledge 2 Axel F by Harold Faltermayer. 3 Crazy for you by Madonna 4 Cherish by Kool and the Gang. 5 Ben by Marti Webb. 6 You'll Never Walk Alone by The Crow 7 Suddenly by Billy Ocean. 8 I'm on Fire by Bruce Springsteen. 9 Kayleigh by Marilion
It is interesting to note that numbers 5 and 6 are both charity records i.e.the proceeds of the sales are donated to a charity.The money raised by "Ben" will go to research on bone marrow diseases. The money from "You'll Never Walk Alone" will go to the Bradford fire disaster fund.
